<img align="left" width="50" alt="tools" src="https://camo.githubusercontent." /><h1>Weather App</h1>

>This simple Weather App allows users to check the current weather conditions for a specific location along with humidity,winds,air quality. It is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide a responsive and interactive user interface.

<p align="center">
    <img src="https://readme-typing-svg.demolab.com/?lines=Weather App  ; ..you can check weather of any location👨🏻‍💻  ; Through%20this Project%20%20!&font=Fira%20Code&center=true&width=440&height=45&color=#37bcf7&vCenter=true&size=22&pause=1000"></a>
</p>

<img align="left" width="50" alt="tools" src="https://camo.githubusercontent." />

<h2 align="left"><i>Tech Stack Used</i></h2>
<div align="left">
<img alt="HTML5" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/html5-%23E34F26.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=html5&logoColor=white"/>
<img alt="CSS3" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/css3-%231572B6.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=css3&logoColor=white"/> 
<img alt="JavaScript" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/javascript-%23323330.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoColor=%23F7DF1E"/>




<h2>Project Outcome</h2>
<p>Gained great experience of Javascript</p>
<p>Learn how to  manage time</p>
<p>Project presentation skill improved.</p>

<h2>Features</h2>
<p>Current Weather: Display the current temperature, weather description, and other relevant information.</p>
<p>Location-based: Users can enter a city name or choose their location for accurate weather updates.</p>
<p>Responsive Design: The app is designed to work seamlessly on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.</p>

<h2>Working</h2>
<p>Enter the name of a city or allow the app to access your location.</p>
<p>View the current weather details for the specified location.</p>
